title: Clising the last Session in a Panel should close the Panel
author: schittli
body_snippet:
Good evening

If one has a session with multiple Panels (each contains Sessions) and then the last session in a Panel gets closed, then the Panel does not get closed.

This is confusing because it is unclear if active sessions are still open in a panel.

## Expected Behavior
If the last Session in a Panel gets closed, 
then the Panel should get closed, too.

## Current Behavior
If the last Session in a Panel gets closed, 
then the empoy Panel is kept open.
